name: Hi-Tech Venture Capital
overview: Established in 1998, High Tech Venture Capital is a privately owned investment company located in Vancouver, Canada. High Tech has achieved a track-record of success consistently providing financial support and value-added services to early stage technology companies. Kirk Exner, founder and president, is a respected technology venture capital professional. Kirk holds a Masters in Business Administration from Schulich School of Business, York University, Canada’s top business school, and a Bachelor’s Degree in Cellular Biology from the University of British Columbia. Prior to High Tech, Mr. Exner served as a technology business consultant and a corporate finance analyst (technology) for a Canadian brokerage firm.
